Trainer_questionare.Course Overview: This course introduces essential digital literacy skills for middle school teachers to enhance classroom engagement and teaching effectiveness.

Key Competency Areas: Use of digital tools in education

Learning Outcome Goals: Teachers should understand fundamental digital literacy concepts.
Teachers should recognize the importance of digital safety.
Teachers should be able to identify and use digital tools for classroom engagement.

Known Pain Points or Challenges: Teachers may feel overwhelmed by the fast pace of technology.
Teachers may have concerns about online safety for students.

Trainer_questionare.Course Duration and Structure: 3 sessions over 1 week, each session lasting 2 hours.
